name: Brittany
startIntroPart1: Greetings, Duchess Anne of Brittany and twice Queen of France! Your duchy is one of the oldest nations in Europe. For centuries, Bretons fought against Rome, the Franks, the Vikings and England. You yourself fought valliantly to preserve Brittany's independence from an inevitable annexation by France.
startIntroPart2: Revered Duchess Anne, your people longs for independence. They trust you to bring back to Brittany its former glory. Will you wear again the ermine coat? Will you build a civilization that will stand the test of time?
declaringWar: This war is necessary to the survival of the Duchy.
attacked: Alas, it had to happen. But Brittany will not go without a fight!
defeated: I surrender, but my heart will forever stay in Brittany.
introduction: Greetings. I am Anne, Duchess of Brittany.
afterPeace: I hope our relations will be peaceful in the future.
tradeRequest: I think this trade would be in our common interest.
